attributes.action: lower all waiting lists for assessments, care needs&appointments within the nhs and homefirst
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is rediculouse the amount of people on waiting lists&the length of time they are made to wait.when people are referred to other proffessionals for whatever reason,they are then faced with very long waiting lists&the main reason is they havent the appropiate amount of staff to deal with the amount of patients,this really needs to change
